# fxy-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                                                                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Default                |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `fxyAlign`       | `fxy-align`        | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the container. Accepts a combination of `justify-content` and `align-content` values. Example: "center space-around". | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `"flex-start stretch"` |
| `fxyAlignLg`     | `fxy-align-lg`     | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the containerfor large devices                                                                                        | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `""`                   |
| `fxyAlignMd`     | `fxy-align-md`     | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the containerfor medium devices                                                                                       | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `""`                   |
| `fxyAlignSm`     | `fxy-align-sm`     | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the containerfor small devices                                                                                        | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `""`                   |
| `fxyAlignXl`     | `fxy-align-xl`     | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the containerfor extra large devices                                                                                  | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `""`                   |
| `fxyAlignXs`     | `fxy-align-xs`     | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the containerfor extra-small devices                                                                                  | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `""`                   |
| `fxyDirection`   | `fxy-direction`    | Sets the flex-direction of the container.  Can be "row", "row-reverse", "column", or "column-reverse".                                                                           | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse" \| { readonly xs?: FlexDirection; readonly sm?: FlexDirection; readonly md?: FlexDirection; readonly lg?: FlexDirection; readonly xl?: FlexDirection; }` | `'row'`                |
| `fxyDirectionLg` | `fxy-direction-lg` | Flex direction for large devices. Accepts 'row', 'row-reverse', 'column', 'column-reverse'.                                                                                      | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                         | `''`                   |
| `fxyDirectionMd` | `fxy-direction-md` | Flex direction for medium devices. Accepts 'row', 'row-reverse', 'column', 'column-reverse'.                                                                                     | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                         | `''`                   |
| `fxyDirectionSm` | `fxy-direction-sm` | Flex direction for small devices. Accepts 'row', 'row-reverse', 'column', 'column-reverse'.                                                                                      | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                         | `''`                   |
| `fxyDirectionXl` | `fxy-direction-xl` | Flex direction for extra-large devices. Accepts 'row', 'row-reverse', 'column', 'column-reverse'.                                                                                | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                         | `''`                   |
| `fxyDirectionXs` | `fxy-direction-xs` | Flex direction for extra-small devices. Accepts 'row', 'row-reverse', 'column', 'column-reverse'.                                                                                | `"" \| "column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                         | `''`                   |
| `fxyFill`        | `fxy-fill`         | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width.                                                                                                                | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyFillLg`      | `fxy-fill-lg`      | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width on large devices.                                                                                               | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyFillMd`      | `fxy-fill-md`      | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width on medium devices.                                                                                              | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyFillSm`      | `fxy-fill-sm`      | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width on small devices.                                                                                               | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyFillXl`      | `fxy-fill-xl`      | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width on extra large devices.                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyFillXs`      | `fxy-fill-xs`      | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width on extra small devices.                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined`            |
| `fxyGap`         | `fxy-gap`          | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`). The value is applied as a right margin to all children except the last one.                                          | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `'0px'`                |
| `fxyGapLg`       | `fxy-gap-lg`       | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`) for large devices..                                                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `''`                   |
| `fxyGapMd`       | `fxy-gap-md`       | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`) for medium devices..                                                                                                  | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `''`                   |
| `fxyGapSm`       | `fxy-gap-sm`       | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`) for small devices..                                                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `''`                   |
| `fxyGapXl`       | `fxy-gap-xl`       | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`) for extra large devices..                                                                                             | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `''`                   |
| `fxyGapXs`       | `fxy-gap-xs`       | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`) for extra small devices..                                                                                             | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `''`                   |
| `fxyWrap`        | `fxy-wrap`         | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container.                                                                                                                                    | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `'nowrap'`             |
| `fxyWrapLg`      | `fxy-wrap-lg`      | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container for large devices.. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                                     | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `''`                   |
| `fxyWrapMd`      | `fxy-wrap-md`      | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container for medium devices.. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                                    | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `''`                   |
| `fxyWrapSm`      | `fxy-wrap-sm`      | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container for small devices.. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                                     | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `''`                   |
| `fxyWrapXl`      | `fxy-wrap-xl`      | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container for extra large devices.. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                               | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `''`                   |
| `fxyWrapXs`      | `fxy-wrap-xs`      | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container for extra small devices.. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                               | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                                                                                                                                                                           | `''`                   |
